main.name: Martin Hadid
main.bio: I have a passion for learning and self-improvement. I have been leading, coaching and training teams for the past 4 years and I can affirm I am truly passionate about working with people. If you ask me I will always choose Python and JavaScript.

education.description: The ITC Data Science Fellows is a 5-month elite program for excellent STEM graduates inspired by the IDF's 8200 unit's methods. I learned data analysis, data mining, machine learning and deep learning focused on Natural Language Processing (NLP).

My studies were focused on management and organization of productive, logistics and administrative processes using modeling through computer tools, which allows to make schedules and projections. I learned how to develop processes and products that involve technological, material, economic, functional and human aspects. I also conducted studies of economic-financial projection, budgets and evaluation of investment projects. In summary, diagnosis, analysis, specification, design, development and implementation of processes and projects in industrial, commercial and service areas.

education.school: Escuela Superior de Comercio Carlos Pellegrini

work.title: UI Manager
work.description: I led and coordinated the User Interface (UI) team. We were 7 Developers, 1 QA and 1 Functional Analyst responsibles for the components library of a SaaS platform. The development of the strategic workplan was based on agile methodologies (SCRUM). I used to mentor and coach engineers, spend regular 1:1s time and give them feedback in performance reviews.

work.title: QA Engineer
work.description: In my first job I used to create analytical reports using information from a MySQL database. Using that information I had to advise managers on process improvements to reduce issues reported by customers. I also evaluated candidates in logical interviews and trained 5 new members.
